meanings.definition: Having more muscles or stronger muscles than someone else.
meanings.sent1: She is the musclier one in our group, able to lift heavier weights.
meanings.sent2: The bodybuilder looked musclier than the other athletes on stage.
meanings.sent3: The musclier dog in the park won the tug-of-war competition.
meanings.sent4: His musclier physique made him stand out in the crowd.
meanings.sent5: The musclier man effortlessly carried the heavy boxes.

meanings.sent1: Out of the two weightlifters, she appeared musclier.

meanings.sent3: The musclier cat in the litter was always the first to catch the toy mouse.
meanings.sent4: Her musclier arms helped her climb the tree faster than the others.
meanings.sent5: The musclier tree branch held the weight of the swinging child.

meanings.definition: To become more muscular or gain more muscle mass.
meanings.sent1: He decided to start working out to musclier his body for the competition.
meanings.sent2: After months of training, he could feel himself getting musclier.
meanings.sent3: The gym-goer joked that he was going to musclier himself into a superhero.
meanings.sent4: His determination to musclier his physique was evident in his daily workouts.
meanings.sent5: The athlete's goal was to musclier his legs for better performance.
